comprehensive_overview: Tassel is a bioinformatics software tool used for analyzing genetic variation in plants. It provides a wide range of functionalities for genetic analysis, visualization, and data management, particularly designed for plant biologists and breeders.
core_features: Some of the core features of Tassel include SNP discovery, population genetic analysis, association mapping, phylogenetic analysis, genotyping by sequencing (GBS) analysis, diversity analysis, and marker-trait association analysis.
